items.definition: The state of being happy, healthy, and comfortable.

examples.text: She prioritizes her well-being by exercising regularly.
examples.translation: Dia memprioritaskan kesejahteraannya dengan berolahraga secara teratur.

examples.text: Because she eats a balanced diet, her well-being has improved significantly.
examples.translation: Karena dia makan makanan seimbang, kesejahteraannya telah meningkat secara signifikan.

examples.text: She exercises regularly and eats a healthy diet to maintain her well-being.
examples.translation: Dia berolahraga secara teratur dan makan makanan sehat untuk menjaga kesejahteraannya.

examples.text: While she was on vacation, she prioritized her well-being by exercising regularly, and as a result, she felt more energized because she had also been eating a balanced diet.
examples.translation: Ketika dia sedang berlibur, dia memprioritaskan kesejahteraannya dengan berolahraga secara teratur, dan sebagai hasilnya, dia merasa lebih berenergi karena dia juga telah makan makanan seimbang.

items.definition: The state of being protected against a particular disease or infection, or the state of being safe from a particular harm or problem

examples.text: The vaccine provides immunity against the disease.
examples.translation: Vaksin tersebut memberikan kekebalan terhadap penyakit.

examples.text: Because she had been vaccinated, she developed immunity to the disease that was going around.
examples.translation: Karena telah divaksinasi, dia mengembangkan kekebalan terhadap penyakit yang sedang menyebar.

examples.text: The doctor checked her immunity, and she was healthy, but her brother was sick.
examples.translation: Dokter memeriksa kekebalannya, dan dia sehat, tapi saudaranya sakit.

examples.text: While the vaccine provides immunity against the disease, it is not a guarantee that the person will not get infected, because other factors can also influence the outcome.
examples.translation: Sementara vaksin memberikan kekebalan terhadap penyakit, itu tidak menjamin bahwa orang tersebut tidak akan terinfeksi, karena faktor lain juga dapat mempengaruhi hasilnya.

items.definition: the study of food and how it affects the body, or the food that a person, animal, or plant needs to stay healthy

examples.text: Eating a balanced diet is essential for good nutrition.
examples.translation: Mengonsumsi makanan seimbang sangat penting untuk gizi yang baik.

examples.text: Because she was concerned about her health, she started to learn about nutrition and how it affects the body.
examples.translation: Karena dia khawatir tentang kesehatannya, dia mulai mempelajari tentang gizi dan bagaimana itu mempengaruhi tubuh.

examples.text: I love reading about nutrition and I also enjoy cooking healthy meals.
examples.translation: Saya suka membaca tentang gizi dan saya juga menikmati memasak makanan sehat.

examples.text: While I was studying nutrition, I realized that eating a balanced diet is not only important for our physical health, but also for our mental well-being, and I also learned that regular exercise can help improve our overall health.
examples.translation: Saat saya belajar tentang gizi, saya menyadari bahwa mengonsumsi makanan seimbang tidak hanya penting untuk kesehatan fisik kita, tetapi juga untuk kesejahteraan mental kita, dan saya juga belajar bahwa olahraga teratur dapat membantu meningkatkan kesehatan kita secara keseluruhan.

items.definition: a condition in which someone is very fat and has a lot of body fat, which can be bad for their health

examples.text: Obesity is a major health problem.
examples.translation: Obesitas adalah masalah kesehatan yang besar.

examples.text: Because obesity is a major health problem, people should eat healthy food.
examples.translation: Karena obesitas adalah masalah kesehatan yang besar, orang harus makan makanan sehat.

examples.text: Obesity is a major health problem, and it can lead to diabetes.
examples.translation: Obesitas adalah masalah kesehatan yang besar, dan dapat menyebabkan diabetes.

examples.text: Although obesity is a major health problem, people who are overweight can still be healthy, but they should exercise regularly and eat healthy food.
examples.translation: Meskipun obesitas adalah masalah kesehatan yang besar, orang yang kelebihan berat badan masih dapat sehat, tetapi mereka harus berolahraga secara teratur dan makan makanan sehat.

items.definition: a way of living in which people spend a lot of time sitting or not being physically active
items.meaning: gaya hidup yang banyak menghabiskan waktu dengan duduk atau tidak banyak beraktivitas fisik

examples.text: She has a sedentary lifestyle and needs to exercise more.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki gaya hidup sedentary dan perlu berolahraga lebih banyak.

examples.text: Because she works at a desk all day, she has developed a sedentary lifestyle.
examples.translation: Karena dia bekerja di meja sepanjang hari, dia telah mengembangkan gaya hidup sedentary.

examples.text: She has a sedentary lifestyle, and she also eats a lot of junk food.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki gaya hidup sedentary, dan dia juga banyak makan makanan junk food.

examples.text: While she knows that a sedentary lifestyle is bad for her health, she has a sedentary lifestyle and also eats a lot of junk food because she works at a desk all day.
examples.translation: Sementara dia tahu bahwa gaya hidup sedentary buruk untuk kesehatannya, dia memiliki gaya hidup sedentary dan juga banyak makan makanan junk food karena dia bekerja di meja sepanjang hari.

items.definition: any disease of the heart or the blood vessels, such as heart disease or stroke

examples.text: Cardiovascular disease is a major cause of death worldwide.
examples.translation: Penyakit kardiovaskular adalah penyebab utama kematian di seluruh dunia.

examples.text: Because cardiovascular disease can be caused by a variety of factors, it is essential to identify the root cause of the problem.
examples.translation: Karena penyakit kardiovaskular dapat disebabkan oleh berbagai faktor, maka sangat penting untuk mengidentifikasi penyebab utama masalah tersebut.

examples.text: Cardiovascular disease is a serious health issue, and regular exercise can help prevent it, but a healthy diet is also necessary.
examples.translation: Penyakit kardiovaskular adalah masalah kesehatan yang serius, dan olahraga teratur dapat membantu mencegahnya, tetapi pola makan sehat juga diperlukan.

examples.text: While cardiovascular disease is a major cause of death worldwide, it can be prevented by a combination of regular exercise, a healthy diet, and not smoking, because these factors can help reduce the risk of heart disease.
examples.translation: Sementara penyakit kardiovaskular adalah penyebab utama kematian di seluruh dunia, namun dapat dicegah dengan kombinasi olahraga teratur, pola makan sehat, dan tidak merokok, karena faktor-faktor tersebut dapat membantu mengurangi risiko penyakit jantung.

items.definition: a medical condition in which the body does not produce enough insulin, leading to high blood sugar levels

examples.text: She was diagnosed with diabetes.
examples.translation: Dia didiagnosis menderita penyakit diabetes.

examples.text: Because she has diabetes, she needs to control her diet.
examples.translation: Karena dia menderita penyakit diabetes, dia perlu mengontrol pola makannya.

examples.text: She has diabetes and her brother has high blood pressure.
examples.translation: Dia menderita penyakit diabetes dan saudaranya memiliki tekanan darah tinggi.

examples.text: While she has diabetes, her brother has high blood pressure, and because of this, they both need to take care of their health.
examples.translation: Sementara dia menderita penyakit diabetes, saudaranya memiliki tekanan darah tinggi, dan karena itu, mereka berdua perlu menjaga kesehatan mereka.

items.definition: a medical condition in which the blood pressure is higher than normal

examples.text: The doctor warned me about hypertension.
examples.translation: Dokter memperingatkan saya tentang hipertensi.

examples.text: Because I have a family history of hypertension, I need to be careful about my diet.
examples.translation: Karena saya memiliki riwayat keluarga hipertensi, saya perlu berhati-hati tentang pola makan saya.

examples.text: I exercise regularly and I eat healthy food, but I still have hypertension.
examples.translation: Saya berolahraga secara teratur dan saya makan makanan sehat, tetapi saya masih memiliki hipertensi.

examples.text: While I have been trying to control my hypertension through diet and exercise, my doctor has also prescribed medication, and I have been taking it regularly, but I still need to monitor my blood pressure closely.
examples.translation: Sementara saya telah berusaha untuk mengontrol hipertensi saya melalui diet dan olahraga, dokter saya juga telah meresepkan obat, dan saya telah mengambilnya secara teratur, tetapi saya masih perlu memantau tekanan darah saya dengan hati-hati.

items.definition: a condition in which the body reacts badly to a particular food, substance, or other agent

examples.text: She has an allergy to peanuts.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki alergi kacang tanah.

examples.text: Because she has a severe allergy, she always carries an EpiPen with her.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki alergi parah, dia selalu membawa EpiPen dengannya.

examples.text: I have an allergy to shellfish, and I also get sick from eating dairy products.
examples.translation: Saya memiliki alergi kerang, dan saya juga jatuh sakit dari mengonsumsi produk susu.

examples.text: While I have an allergy to gluten, my sister is not allergic, but she prefers to eat gluten-free food because she believes it is healthier, and she also avoids eating dairy products.
examples.translation: Sementara saya memiliki alergi gluten, adik saya tidak alergi, tapi dia lebih suka makan makanan bebas gluten karena dia percaya itu lebih sehat, dan dia juga menghindari mengonsumsi produk susu.

items.definition: A person's condition with regard to their psychological and emotional well-being.

examples.text: Mental health is very important.
examples.translation: Kesehatan mental sangat penting.

examples.text: Because mental health is important, we should prioritize it.
examples.translation: Karena kesehatan mental penting, kita sebaiknya memprioritaskannya.

examples.text: Mental health is important and we should prioritize it every day.
examples.translation: Kesehatan mental penting dan kita sebaiknya memprioritaskannya setiap hari.

examples.text: While mental health is important, we should also prioritize physical health because they are interconnected, and a healthy lifestyle can improve both.
examples.translation: Sementara kesehatan mental penting, kita juga sebaiknya memprioritaskan kesehatan fisik karena keduanya saling terkait, dan gaya hidup sehat dapat memperbaiki keduanya.

items.definition: a mental state characterized by low mood, feelings of sadness, and a lack of interest or pleasure in activities

examples.text: She has been suffering from depression for years.
examples.translation: Dia telah menderita depresi selama bertahun-tahun.

examples.text: Because she lost her job, she felt depressed and isolated.
examples.translation: Karena dia kehilangan pekerjaannya, dia merasa depresi dan terisolasi.

examples.text: She felt depressed, and she also felt anxious about her future.
examples.translation: Dia merasa depresi, dan dia juga merasa cemas tentang masa depannya.

examples.text: While she was going through a difficult time, she felt depressed because she had lost her job, and she also felt anxious about her future.
examples.translation: Saat dia menghadapi masa sulit, dia merasa depresi karena dia kehilangan pekerjaannya, dan dia juga merasa cemas tentang masa depannya.

items.definition: a mental health condition in which a person feels extremely worried or nervous, often about things that might happen in the future

examples.text: She has been diagnosed with an anxiety disorder.
examples.translation: Dia telah didiagnosa mengidap gangguan kecemasan.

examples.text: Because she has an anxiety disorder, she often feels overwhelmed by everyday tasks.
examples.translation: Karena dia mengidap gangguan kecemasan, dia sering merasa terlalu banyak untuk tugas sehari-hari.

examples.text: She has an anxiety disorder and also struggles with depression.
examples.translation: Dia mengidap gangguan kecemasan dan juga berjuang melawan depresi.

examples.text: While she has been dealing with an anxiety disorder, she also struggles with depression because her mother had the same condition.
examples.translation: Sementara dia telah menghadapi gangguan kecemasan, dia juga berjuang melawan depresi karena ibunya memiliki kondisi yang sama.

items.definition: treatment for someone who is ill, either physically or mentally, intended to make them better or to help them deal with their condition

examples.text: She is undergoing therapy to recover from her injury.
examples.translation: Dia menjalani terapi untuk pulih dari cedera tersebut.

examples.text: Because she was experiencing anxiety, she started attending therapy sessions to learn how to manage her emotions.
examples.translation: Karena dia mengalami kecemasan, dia mulai menghadiri sesi terapi untuk belajar mengelola emosinya.

examples.text: The doctor recommended therapy, and she also started exercising regularly to improve her overall health.
examples.translation: Dokter menyarankan terapi, dan dia juga mulai berolahraga secara teratur untuk meningkatkan kesehatannya secara keseluruhan.

examples.text: While attending therapy sessions to overcome her fear of public speaking, she also joined a debate club, and as a result, her confidence improved significantly, which in turn helped her to perform better at work.
examples.translation: Saat menghadiri sesi terapi untuk mengatasi rasa takutnya berbicara di depan umum, dia juga bergabung dengan klub debat, dan sebagai hasilnya, kepercayaan dirinya meningkat secara signifikan, yang pada gilirannya membantunya untuk berperforma lebih baik di tempat kerja.

items.definition: The act of giving someone a vaccine to prevent them from getting a particular disease

examples.text: The doctor recommended vaccination against flu.
examples.translation: Dokter merekomendasikan vaksinasi terhadap flu.

examples.text: Because vaccination is mandatory, all children must be vaccinated before starting school.
examples.translation: Karena vaksinasi adalah wajib, semua anak harus divaksinasi sebelum memulai sekolah.

examples.text: The hospital offers vaccination and medical check-ups for free, and people can visit the clinic or go to the hospital.
examples.translation: Rumah sakit menawarkan vaksinasi dan pemeriksaan medis secara gratis, dan orang dapat mengunjungi klinik atau pergi ke rumah sakit.

examples.text: While vaccination is an effective way to prevent the spread of diseases, it is also important to note that some people may have adverse reactions, and therefore, they should consult their doctors before getting vaccinated, or they may choose to visit a specialist.
examples.translation: Sementara vaksinasi adalah cara yang efektif untuk mencegah penyebaran penyakit, juga penting untuk dicatat bahwa beberapa orang mungkin memiliki reaksi negatif, dan oleh karena itu, mereka harus berkonsultasi dengan dokter sebelum divaksinasi, atau mereka dapat memilih untuk mengunjungi seorang spesialis.

items.definition: a situation in which a large number of people in a particular area all have a particular disease at the same time

examples.text: The flu is an epidemic in the city.
examples.translation: Flu adalah wabah di kota.

examples.text: Because the water supply was contaminated, an epidemic of cholera broke out in the village.
examples.translation: Karena pasokan air terkontaminasi, wabah kolera pecah di desa.

examples.text: The city is experiencing an epidemic of flu, and the hospital is experiencing a shortage of doctors.
examples.translation: Kota tersebut mengalami wabah flu, dan rumah sakit mengalami kekurangan dokter.

examples.text: While the government is trying to control the epidemic of COVID-19, the economy is also experiencing a downturn, and many businesses are struggling to stay afloat because the restrictions are affecting their sales.
examples.translation: Sementara pemerintah berusaha untuk mengendalikan wabah COVID-19, perekonomian juga mengalami kemerosotan, dan banyak bisnis berjuang untuk tetap bertahan karena pembatasan tersebut mempengaruhi penjualan mereka.

items.definition: able to spread or catch a disease

examples.text: The doctor said the illness is contagious.
examples.translation: Dokter mengatakan penyakit itu menular.

examples.text: Although she was feeling unwell, she still came to the party because she didn't know that her illness was contagious.
examples.translation: Meskipun dia merasa tidak enak badan, dia tetap datang ke pesta karena dia tidak tahu bahwa penyakitnya menular.

examples.text: The contagious disease spread quickly, and many people got sick, but fortunately, the hospital was able to provide treatment.
examples.translation: Penyakit menular itu menyebar dengan cepat, dan banyak orang jatuh sakit, tapi untungnya, rumah sakit dapat menyediakan pengobatan.

examples.text: While the contagious disease spread quickly, and many people got sick, the hospital was able to provide treatment, but only because the doctors had experience with similar cases before.
examples.translation: Sementara penyakit menular itu menyebar dengan cepat, dan banyak orang jatuh sakit, rumah sakit dapat menyediakan pengobatan, tapi hanya karena dokter-dokter tersebut memiliki pengalaman dengan kasus serupa sebelumnya.

items.definition: the process of helping someone who has been ill or in prison to become healthy or normal again

examples.text: The patient underwent rehabilitation after the surgery.
examples.translation: Pasien menjalani rehabilitasi setelah operasi.

examples.text: Because she had been bedridden for months, she required rehabilitation to regain her strength.
examples.translation: Karena dia telah terbaring di tempat tidur selama berbulan-bulan, dia memerlukan rehabilitasi untuk mengembalikan kekuatannya.

examples.text: The hospital offered rehabilitation and the patient recovered quickly, and she was able to return home soon.
examples.translation: Rumah sakit menawarkan rehabilitasi dan pasien pulih dengan cepat, dan dia dapat kembali ke rumah segera.

examples.text: While the new employee was undergoing rehabilitation because he had been injured on the job, his colleague helped him with his tasks, and they were both able to meet the deadline, although it was challenging.
examples.translation: Ketika karyawan baru menjalani rehabilitasi karena dia telah terluka saat bekerja, rekan kerjanya membantunya dengan tugas-tugasnya, dan mereka berdua dapat memenuhi deadline, meskipun itu menantang.

items.definition: a state of health caused by a lack of food or a lack of certain nutrients in the food that you eat

examples.text: The child suffered from malnutrition due to a poor diet.
examples.translation: Anak itu menderita kekurangan gizi karena pola makan yang buruk.

examples.text: Because the family was unable to afford nutritious food, the child developed malnutrition.
examples.translation: Karena keluarga tidak mampu membeli makanan bergizi, anak itu mengalami kekurangan gizi.

examples.text: The region experienced famine and malnutrition, and many people suffered as a result.
examples.translation: Daerah tersebut mengalami kelaparan dan kekurangan gizi, dan banyak orang menderita akibatnya.

examples.text: While the new government has implemented policies to reduce poverty, it has also struggled to address the issues of famine and malnutrition that have plagued the country for decades, because the problems are deeply rooted in the nation's history.
examples.translation: Sementara pemerintah baru telah melaksanakan kebijakan untuk mengurangi kemiskinan, juga berjuang untuk mengatasi masalah kelaparan dan kekurangan gizi yang telah melanda negara selama beberapa dekade, karena masalah-masalah tersebut sangat berakar dalam sejarah bangsa.

items.definition: a approach to medicine that considers the whole person, including their physical, mental, and emotional health, when treating a disease or illness

examples.text: The doctor specialized in holistic medicine.
examples.translation: Dokter tersebut berspesialisasi dalam pengobatan holistik.

examples.text: Because holistic medicine considers the whole person, it is often more effective than traditional treatments.
examples.translation: Karena pengobatan holistik mempertimbangkan keseluruhan seseorang, seringkali lebih efektif daripada perawatan tradisional.

examples.text: The hospital offered holistic medicine and traditional therapy, so patients had a choice.
examples.translation: Rumah sakit tersebut menawarkan pengobatan holistik dan terapi tradisional, sehingga pasien memiliki pilihan.

examples.text: While some doctors specialize in holistic medicine, others prefer traditional treatments, and because each approach has its own benefits, patients should consider their options carefully.
examples.translation: Sementara beberapa dokter berspesialisasi dalam pengobatan holistik, yang lain lebih suka perawatan tradisional, dan karena setiap pendekatan memiliki kelebihan masing-masing, pasien sebaiknya mempertimbangkan pilihan mereka dengan hati-hati.

items.definition: Medicines or treatments made from plants, used to prevent or cure diseases or medical conditions.
items.meaning: Obat-obatan atau pengobatan yang terbuat dari tanaman, digunakan untuk mencegah atau menyembuhkan penyakit atau kondisi medis.

examples.text: She uses herbal remedies to cure her headache.
examples.translation: Dia menggunakan obat-obatan herbal untuk menyembuhkan sakit kepalanya.

examples.text: Because herbal remedies are natural, they are often preferred over chemical-based medicines.
examples.translation: Karena obat-obatan herbal adalah alami, mereka sering lebih disukai daripada obat-obatan berbasis kimia.

examples.text: Herbal remedies are popular, and many people use them to cure their illnesses, but some are not effective.
examples.translation: Obat-obatan herbal populer, dan banyak orang menggunakan mereka untuk menyembuhkan penyakit mereka, tetapi beberapa tidak efektif.

examples.text: While herbal remedies can be effective in treating some medical conditions, they can also interact with other medications, and therefore, patients should consult their doctors before using them, because some interactions can be harmful.
examples.translation: Sementara obat-obatan herbal dapat efektif dalam mengobati beberapa kondisi medis, mereka juga dapat berinteraksi dengan obat-obatan lain, dan oleh karena itu, pasien harus berkonsultasi dengan dokter mereka sebelum menggunakan mereka, karena beberapa interaksi dapat berbahaya.

items.definition: the state of being physically or mentally dependent on something, especially a drug

examples.text: She has an addiction to coffee.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki kecanduan terhadap kopi.

examples.text: Because she started drinking at a young age, she developed an addiction to alcohol.
examples.translation: Karena dia mulai minum pada usia muda, dia mengembangkan kecanduan terhadap alkohol.

examples.text: She has an addiction to coffee, and she also loves tea.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki kecanduan terhadap kopi, dan dia juga menyukai teh.

examples.text: While she was studying, she developed an addiction to coffee, and as a result, she started to drink it every morning, but she also realized that she needed to reduce her intake because it was affecting her sleep.
examples.translation: Saat dia belajar, dia mengembangkan kecanduan terhadap kopi, dan sebagai hasilnya, dia mulai minum setiap pagi, tetapi dia juga menyadari bahwa dia perlu mengurangi konsumsinya karena itu mempengaruhi tidurnya.

items.definition: a condition that occurs when the body is no longer able to function normally because it has stopped using a substance, such as a drug, to which it has become accustomed

examples.text: The patient experienced withdrawal symptoms after quitting smoking.
examples.translation: Pasien mengalami gejala putus zat setelah berhenti merokok.

examples.text: Because she had been taking the medication for a long time, she suffered from withdrawal symptoms when she stopped using it.
examples.translation: Karena dia telah mengonsumsi obat tersebut dalam waktu lama, dia menderita gejala putus zat ketika dia berhenti menggunakannya.

examples.text: The doctor warned the patient about withdrawal symptoms, and the patient decided to quit smoking gradually.
examples.translation: Dokter memperingatkan pasien tentang gejala putus zat, dan pasien memutuskan untuk berhenti merokok secara bertahap.

examples.text: While the new medication helped to reduce the patient's pain, it also caused withdrawal symptoms, because the patient had been taking the old medication for a long time, and the doctor had to adjust the dosage carefully.
examples.translation: Sementara obat baru membantu mengurangi rasa sakit pasien, juga menyebabkan gejala putus zat, karena pasien telah mengonsumsi obat lama selama waktu lama, dan dokter harus menyesuaikan dosis dengan hati-hati.

items.definition: A condition that someone is born with, which is caused by a problem with their genes

examples.text: The child was born with a genetic disorder.
examples.translation: Anak itu lahir dengan gangguan genetik.

examples.text: Because the family has a history of genetic disorders, they decided to undergo genetic testing.
examples.translation: Karena keluarga memiliki riwayat gangguan genetik, mereka memutuskan untuk melakukan tes genetik.

examples.text: The doctor studied the patient's genetic disorder, and she also examined the family's medical history.
examples.translation: Dokter itu mempelajari gangguan genetik pasien, dan dia juga memeriksa riwayat medis keluarga.

examples.text: While the researchers were studying the genetic disorder, they discovered a new gene that was linked to it, and they also found that it was more common in certain populations.
examples.translation: Saat para peneliti mempelajari gangguan genetik, mereka menemukan gen baru yang terkait dengannya, dan mereka juga menemukan bahwa itu lebih umum di beberapa populasi tertentu.

items.definition: the system that protects the body from infection and disease

examples.text: The immune system helps fight off infections.
examples.translation: Sistem kekebalan tubuh membantu melawan infeksi.

examples.text: Because she had a strong immune system, she was able to recover quickly from the illness.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki sistem kekebalan tubuh yang kuat, dia dapat pulih dengan cepat dari penyakit tersebut.

examples.text: The doctor checked her immune system and prescribed some medication, and she started to feel better soon.
examples.translation: Dokter memeriksa sistem kekebalan tubuhnya dan meresepkan beberapa obat, dan dia mulai merasa lebih baik segera.

examples.text: While the new medicine had improved her condition significantly, it was her immune system that ultimately helped her recover, and she was grateful for the doctor's care.
examples.translation: Sementara obat baru tersebut telah memperbaiki kondisinya secara signifikan, namun itu adalah sistem kekebalan tubuhnya yang akhirnya membantunya pulih, dan dia bersyukur atas perawatan dokter.

items.definition: a disease or condition that affects the lungs or airways, making it difficult to breathe

examples.text: She has a respiratory illness.
examples.translation: Dia menderita penyakit pernapasan.

examples.text: Because she has a respiratory illness, she needs to use an inhaler.
examples.translation: Karena dia menderita penyakit pernapasan, dia perlu menggunakan inhaler.

examples.text: She has a respiratory illness, and she also has a fever.
examples.translation: Dia menderita penyakit pernapasan, dan dia juga demam.

examples.text: She has a respiratory illness, and because she has been smoking for years, she also has a persistent cough, but she is trying to quit.
examples.translation: Dia menderita penyakit pernapasan, dan karena dia telah merokok selama bertahun-tahun, dia juga memiliki batuk yang persisten, tapi dia berusaha untuk berhenti.

items.definition: a disease or condition that lasts for a long time, often for the rest of a person's life

examples.text: Diabetes is a chronic disease.
examples.translation: Diabetes adalah penyakit kronis.

examples.text: Because she has a chronic disease, she needs to take medication every day.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki penyakit kronis, dia perlu mengonsumsi obat setiap hari.

examples.text: Chronic diseases are expensive to treat, and they can also cause a lot of pain.
examples.translation: Penyakit kronis mahal biayanya, dan juga dapat menyebabkan banyak rasa sakit.

examples.text: While chronic diseases can be managed with medication, they are often caused by a combination of genetic and environmental factors, and they can have a significant impact on a person's quality of life.
examples.translation: Sementara penyakit kronis dapat diatasi dengan obat, mereka sering disebabkan oleh kombinasi faktor genetik dan lingkungan, dan juga dapat memiliki dampak signifikan pada kualitas hidup seseorang.

items.definition: a disease or condition that has a sudden onset, severe symptoms, and a relatively short duration

examples.text: The patient was hospitalized due to an acute illness.
examples.translation: Pasien dirawat di rumah sakit karena penyakit akut.

examples.text: Because the patient had a history of heart disease, the doctor suspected that the acute illness was related to it.
examples.translation: Karena pasien memiliki riwayat penyakit jantung, dokter menduga bahwa penyakit akut tersebut terkait dengan hal itu.

examples.text: The doctor treated the patient for both the acute illness and the chronic condition, and the patient made a full recovery.
examples.translation: Dokter mengobati pasien untuk penyakit akut dan kondisi kronis, dan pasien pulih sepenuhnya.

examples.text: While the doctor treated the patient for the acute illness, the nurse also monitored the patient's condition because the patient had a history of heart disease, and the doctor suspected that the acute illness was related to it.
examples.translation: Saat dokter mengobati pasien untuk penyakit akut, perawat juga memantau kondisi pasien karena pasien memiliki riwayat penyakit jantung, dan dokter menduga bahwa penyakit akut tersebut terkait dengan hal itu.

items.definition: The department of medicine that deals with the prevention and treatment of injuries and diseases that happen as a result of work

examples.text: The company has a department of occupational health.
examples.translation: Perusahaan tersebut memiliki departemen kesehatan kerja.

examples.text: Because the workers were exposed to toxic chemicals, the company was required to provide them with regular occupational health check-ups.
examples.translation: Karena pekerja terpapar bahan kimia beracun, perusahaan diwajibkan untuk memberikan mereka pemeriksaan kesehatan kerja secara teratur.

examples.text: The company provides occupational health services and also offers fitness classes for employees.
examples.translation: Perusahaan menyediakan layanan kesehatan kerja dan juga menawarkan kelas kebugaran untuk karyawan.

examples.text: While the company provides occupational health services, it also requires employees to attend workshops on stress management, because many workers have been experiencing high levels of stress, which can negatively impact their occupational health.
examples.translation: Sementara perusahaan menyediakan layanan kesehatan kerja, juga meminta karyawan untuk menghadiri lokakarya tentang manajemen stres, karena banyak pekerja telah mengalami tingkat stres yang tinggi, yang dapat berdampak negatif pada kesehatan kerja mereka.

items.definition: The state of being clean and free from dirt, bacteria, or other things that can cause disease

examples.text: Washing your hands is an important part of personal hygiene.
examples.translation: Mencuci tangan adalah bagian penting dari kebersihan pribadi.

examples.text: Because she didn't practice good hygiene, she got sick easily.
examples.translation: Karena dia tidak berkebersihan yang baik, dia mudah sakit.

examples.text: I exercise regularly and I also practice good hygiene to stay healthy.
examples.translation: Saya berolahraga secara teratur dan saya juga berkebersihan yang baik untuk menjaga kesehatan.

examples.text: While I was traveling, I made sure to practice good hygiene, because I knew that if I didn't, I would get sick, and also I didn't want to infect others.
examples.translation: Ketika saya bepergian, saya memastikan untuk berkebersihan yang baik, karena saya tahu bahwa jika saya tidak, saya akan sakit, dan juga saya tidak ingin menginfeksi orang lain.

items.definition: The period of life when a young person develops from a child into an adult, from about 13 to 19 years old.

examples.text: Adolescence is a challenging time for many young people.
examples.translation: Masa remaja adalah waktu yang menantang bagi banyak orang muda.

examples.text: Because adolescence is a critical period of development, it is essential to provide young people with proper guidance and support.
examples.translation: Karena masa remaja adalah periode kritis perkembangan, sangat penting untuk menyediakan orang muda dengan bimbingan dan dukungan yang tepat.

examples.text: Adolescence is a time of change, and teenagers often experience mood swings and emotional turmoil, but they also develop new skills and make lasting friendships.
examples.translation: Masa remaja adalah waktu perubahan, dan remaja sering mengalami perubahan mood dan badai emosi, tetapi mereka juga mengembangkan keterampilan baru dan membuat persahabatan yang langgeng.

examples.text: While adolescence can be a difficult and confusing time, it is also a period of great opportunity, because teenagers who are given the chance to develop their talents and pursue their passions often become confident and successful adults, and they are more likely to make a positive impact on their communities, which in turn can lead to a more harmonious and prosperous society.
examples.translation: Sementara masa remaja dapat menjadi waktu yang sulit dan membingungkan, itu juga merupakan periode kesempatan besar, karena remaja yang diberi kesempatan untuk mengembangkan bakat dan mengejar passion mereka sering menjadi dewasa yang percaya diri dan sukses, dan mereka lebih mungkin membuat dampak positif pada masyarakat mereka, yang pada gilirannya dapat menyebabkan masyarakat yang lebih harmonis dan makmur.

items.definition: The period of life when a young person develops physically and sexually to become an adult.

examples.text: She entered puberty at the age of 12.
examples.translation: Dia memasuki masa puber pada usia 12.

examples.text: Because she entered puberty early, she was often self-conscious about her body.
examples.translation: Karena dia memasuki masa puber lebih awal, dia sering merasa tidak nyaman dengan tubuhnya.

examples.text: The boy was excited to start high school, but he was also nervous about going through puberty.
examples.translation: Anak laki-laki itu bersemangat untuk memulai sekolah menengah, tetapi dia juga gugup tentang melewati masa puber.

examples.text: While the girl was excited to start high school, she was also nervous about going through puberty, because she had heard that it could be a difficult time.
examples.translation: Saat gadis itu bersemangat untuk memulai sekolah menengah, dia juga gugup tentang melewati masa puber, karena dia telah mendengar bahwa itu bisa menjadi waktu yang sulit.

items.definition: The process by which the brain develops and matures, especially in children, and by which a person becomes able to think, learn and understand more and more complicated things

examples.text: The child's cognitive development was amazing.
examples.translation: Perkembangan kognitif anak itu luar biasa.

examples.text: Because the teacher used interactive methods, the students' cognitive development improved significantly.
examples.translation: Karena guru menggunakan metode interaktif, perkembangan kognitif siswa meningkat secara signifikan.

examples.text: The child's cognitive development was impressive, and her language skills were excellent.
examples.translation: Perkembangan kognitif anak itu mengesankan, dan kemampuan bahasanya sangat baik.

examples.text: While the students' cognitive development was progressing well, their social skills also improved because the teacher encouraged teamwork, and as a result, they became more confident.
examples.translation: Sementara perkembangan kognitif siswa berjalan dengan baik, kemampuan sosial mereka juga meningkat karena guru mendorong kerja tim, dan sebagai hasilnya, mereka menjadi lebih percaya diri.

items.definition: the ability to control and understand your emotions, and to deal with situations in a mature and sensible way

examples.text: She showed emotional maturity by forgiving her enemy.
examples.translation: Dia menunjukkan kedewasaan emosional dengan memaafkan musuhnya.

examples.text: Because she had achieved emotional maturity, she was able to handle the difficult situation.
examples.translation: Karena dia telah mencapai kedewasaan emosional, dia mampu menangani situasi yang sulit.

examples.text: She was emotionally mature, and she was also very intelligent.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki kedewasaan emosional, dan dia juga sangat pintar.

examples.text: While she was emotionally mature, her brother was still struggling to achieve it, because he had not learned how to control his emotions.
examples.translation: Sementara dia memiliki kedewasaan emosional, saudaranya masih berjuang untuk mencapainya, karena dia belum belajar bagaimana mengendalikan emosinya.

items.definition: the ability to behave and communicate effectively with other people

examples.text: She has excellent social skills.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki keterampilan bersosialisasi yang sangat baik.

examples.text: Because she has good social skills, she can easily make friends.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki keterampilan bersosialisasi yang baik, dia dapat dengan mudah berteman.

examples.text: She has social skills and she is very intelligent, so she can succeed in any field.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki keterampilan bersosialisasi dan dia sangat pintar, sehingga dia dapat sukses di bidang apa pun.

examples.text: While she has social skills, which help her to communicate effectively, she also has a strong personality that makes her a great leader, and she is very intelligent, so she can succeed in any field.
examples.translation: Sementara dia memiliki keterampilan bersosialisasi, yang membantunya untuk berkomunikasi secara efektif, dia juga memiliki kepribadian yang kuat yang membuatnya seorang pemimpin hebat, dan dia sangat pintar, sehingga dia dapat sukses di bidang apa pun.

items.definition: the strong influence that a group of people of the same age can have on each other, especially on young people

examples.text: She gave in to peer pressure and started smoking.
examples.translation: Dia menyerah pada tekanan teman sebaya dan mulai merokok.

examples.text: Because she wanted to fit in, she started wearing the same clothes as her friends, even though she didn't like them, which showed that she was vulnerable to peer pressure.
examples.translation: Karena dia ingin bergabung, dia mulai mengenakan pakaian yang sama dengan teman-temannya, meskipun dia tidak menyukainya, yang menunjukkan bahwa dia rentan terhadap tekanan teman sebaya.

examples.text: She joined the club because of peer pressure, and she also wanted to meet new people.
examples.translation: Dia bergabung dengan klub karena tekanan teman sebaya, dan dia juga ingin bertemu orang baru.

examples.text: While she was aware that peer pressure had influenced her decision to join the club, she also realized that she had been wanting to meet new people, and because her friends were already members, she decided to join, even though she was initially hesitant.
examples.translation: Sementara dia menyadari bahwa tekanan teman sebaya telah mempengaruhi keputusannya untuk bergabung dengan klub, dia juga menyadari bahwa dia telah ingin bertemu orang baru, dan karena teman-temannya sudah menjadi anggota, dia memutuskan untuk bergabung, meskipun awalnya dia ragu-ragu.

items.definition: The state of being free from the control or influence of others

examples.text: She values her independence.
examples.translation: Dia menghargai kemerdekaannya.

examples.text: Because she had a job, she was able to maintain her independence.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki pekerjaan, dia dapat mempertahankan kemerdekaannya.

examples.text: She wanted independence, but she also wanted to get married.
examples.translation: Dia ingin kemerdekaan, tetapi dia juga ingin menikah.

examples.text: While she valued her independence, she also knew that getting married would mean that she had to make some compromises, but she was willing to do so because she loved him.
examples.translation: Sementara dia menghargai kemerdekaannya, dia juga tahu bahwa menikah berarti dia harus membuat beberapa kompromi, tetapi dia mau melakukannya karena dia mencintainya.

items.definition: the practice of training people to obey rules or a code of behaviour, using punishment or penalties to correct disobedience

examples.text: She has the discipline to finish her homework on time.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki disiplin untuk menyelesaikan pekerjaan rumahnya tepat waktu.

examples.text: Because she has discipline, she can control her emotions and make rational decisions.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki disiplin, dia dapat mengontrol emosinya dan membuat keputusan rasional.

examples.text: She studies hard and plays sports regularly, and she believes that discipline is essential for success in both areas.
examples.translation: Dia belajar dengan giat dan berolahraga secara teratur, dan dia percaya bahwa disiplin sangat penting untuk kesuksesan di kedua bidang tersebut.

examples.text: While some people think that discipline is restrictive, she believes that it is liberating because it allows her to achieve her goals, and she has learned to appreciate the value of discipline through her experiences.
examples.translation: Sementara beberapa orang berpikir bahwa disiplin membatasi, dia percaya bahwa itu membebaskan karena itu memungkinkan dia untuk mencapai tujuannya, dan dia telah belajar untuk menghargai nilai disiplin melalui pengalamannya.

items.definition: The duty of being accountable for one’s actions
a person's opinion of their own worth, ability, or attractiveness

examples.text: She has low self-esteem.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki harga diri yang rendah.

examples.text: Because she failed the exam, she has low self-esteem.
examples.translation: Karena dia gagal ujian, dia memiliki harga diri yang rendah.

examples.text: She has low self-esteem, and she is shy.
examples.translation: Dia memiliki harga diri yang rendah, dan dia pemalu.

examples.text: Although she has low self-esteem, she is trying to improve herself, and she is also very determined to succeed.
examples.translation: Meskipun dia memiliki harga diri yang rendah, dia berusaha untuk memperbaiki diri, dan dia juga sangat bersemangat untuk sukses.

items.definition: Physical activity that increases heart rate and oxygen intake

examples.text: Usage of Aerobic exercise is important.
Because Aerobic exercise matters, we should study it.
The word is Aerobic exercise, and it is useful.
If we use Aerobic exercise correctly, we succeed, so let's try.

items.definition: Exercise, such as weightlifting or push-ups, that does not need oxygen to generate energy

examples.text: Anaerobic exercise helps build muscle mass.
examples.translation: Olahraga anaerobik membantu membangun massa otot.

examples.text: Because anaerobic exercise is intense, it improves cardiovascular health.
examples.translation: Karena olahraga anaerobik sangat intens, maka itu memperbaiki kesehatan kardiovaskular.

examples.text: Anaerobic exercise helps build muscle mass, and it also improves bone density.
examples.translation: Olahraga anaerobik membantu membangun massa otot, dan juga memperbaiki kepadatan tulang.

examples.text: While anaerobic exercise is beneficial for building muscle, it can be harmful if overdone, because it increases the risk of injury, and it also puts excessive strain on the muscles.
examples.translation: Sementara olahraga anaerobik bermanfaat untuk membangun otot, itu bisa berbahaya jika berlebihan, karena itu meningkatkan risiko cedera, dan juga memberikan tekanan berlebih pada otot-otot.

items.definition: The ability to sustain physical activity over time

examples.text: Usage of Endurance is important.
Because Endurance matters, we should study it.
The word is Endurance, and it is useful.
If we use Endurance correctly, we succeed, so let's try.

items.definition: The ability to change or be changed easily according to the situation

examples.text: The company values flexibility in its employees.
examples.translation: Perusahaan menghargai kelenturan pada karyawannya.

examples.text: Because the new policy allows for more flexibility, employees can now work from home.
examples.translation: Karena kebijakan baru memungkinkan kelenturan yang lebih besar, karyawan sekarang dapat bekerja dari rumah.

examples.text: The teacher offered flexibility in assignment deadlines, and students appreciated it, but some still struggled to meet them.
examples.translation: Guru menawarkan kelenturan dalam batas waktu tugas, dan siswa menghargainya, tetapi beberapa masih berjuang untuk memenuhinya.

examples.text: While the new employee was grateful for the flexibility in scheduling, she realized that it also meant she had to be available to work at short notice, which was sometimes challenging, but her supervisor was understanding and supportive.
examples.translation: Sementara karyawan baru bersyukur atas kelenturan dalam penjadwalan, dia menyadari bahwa itu juga berarti dia harus siap bekerja dengan pemberitahuan singkat, yang terkadang menantang, tetapi atasannya memahami dan mendukung.

items.definition: Exercise designed to increase muscle power and endurance

examples.text: Usage of Strength training is important.
Because Strength training matters, we should study it.
The word is Strength training, and it is useful.
If we use Strength training correctly, we succeed, so let's try.

items.definition: The state of being physically fit and healthy, especially in relation to the heart and lungs.
items.meaning: Kesehatan dan kebugaran jantung serta paru-paru

examples.text: Regular exercise improves cardiovascular fitness.
examples.translation: Olahraga teratur meningkatkan kesehatan dan kebugaran jantung serta paru-paru.

examples.text: Because cardiovascular fitness is essential for overall health, people should engage in physical activities regularly.
examples.translation: Karena kesehatan dan kebugaran jantung serta paru-paru sangat penting untuk kesehatan secara keseluruhan, orang harus terlibat dalam kegiatan fisik secara teratur.

examples.text: Cardiovascular fitness is important, and people should exercise regularly, or they may face health problems.
examples.translation: Kesehatan dan kebugaran jantung serta paru-paru sangat penting, dan orang harus berolahraga secara teratur, atau mereka mungkin menghadapi masalah kesehatan.

examples.text: While cardiovascular fitness is crucial for overall well-being, people who exercise regularly not only improve their heart health but also reduce the risk of other diseases, or they may experience a decline in their physical condition.
examples.translation: Sementara kesehatan dan kebugaran jantung serta paru-paru sangat penting untuk kesejahteraan secara keseluruhan, orang yang berolahraga secara teratur tidak hanya meningkatkan kesehatan jantung mereka tetapi juga mengurangi risiko penyakit lain, atau mereka mungkin mengalami penurunan kondisi fisik mereka.

items.definition: The increase in muscle size due to resistance training

examples.text: Usage of Muscle hypertrophy is important.
Because Muscle hypertrophy matters, we should study it.
The word is Muscle hypertrophy, and it is useful.
If we use Muscle hypertrophy correctly, we succeed, so let's try.

items.definition: The chemical processes that happen within a living organism to maintain life

examples.text: The doctor explained that a fast metabolism helps burn calories.
examples.translation: Dokter menjelaskan bahwa metabolisme yang cepat membantu membakar kalori.

examples.text: Because she had a high metabolism, she was able to eat a lot without gaining weight.
examples.translation: Karena dia memiliki metabolisme yang tinggi, dia bisa makan banyak tanpa mendapatkan berat badan.

examples.text: Exercise boosts metabolism, and a healthy diet also helps to increase it.
examples.translation: Olahraga meningkatkan metabolisme, dan pola makan sehat juga membantu meningkatkannya.

examples.text: While a fast metabolism can be beneficial for weight loss, it can also lead to nutritional deficiencies if not properly managed, because the body burns calories quickly.
examples.translation: Sementara metabolisme yang cepat dapat bermanfaat untuk penurunan berat badan, juga dapat menyebabkan kekurangan gizi jika tidak dikelola dengan baik, karena tubuh membakar kalori dengan cepat.

items.definition: A workout involving short bursts of intense activity followed by rest

examples.text: Usage of High-Intensity Interval Training is important.
Because High-Intensity Interval Training matters, we should study it.
The word is High-Intensity Interval Training, and it is useful.
If we use High-Intensity Interval Training correctly, we succeed, so let's try.

items.definition: The amount of fat, muscle, and other tissues in the body.

examples.text: Regular exercise can improve your body composition.
examples.translation: Olahraga teratur dapat meningkatkan komposisi tubuh Anda.

examples.text: Because a healthy body composition is linked to a lower risk of chronic diseases, it is essential to maintain a balanced diet.
examples.translation: Karena komposisi tubuh yang sehat terkait dengan risiko penyakit kronis yang lebih rendah, sangat penting untuk mempertahankan pola makan yang seimbang.

examples.text: I want to lose weight and improve my body composition, but I also need to eat more to gain muscle mass.
examples.translation: Saya ingin menurunkan berat badan dan meningkatkan komposisi tubuh, tetapi saya juga perlu makan lebih banyak untuk mendapatkan massa otot.

examples.text: While it is true that genetics play a role in determining body composition, regular exercise and a healthy diet can also significantly impact it, because a well-balanced lifestyle can help regulate metabolism and burn fat more efficiently.
examples.translation: Sementara itu benar bahwa genetika memainkan peran dalam menentukan komposisi tubuh, olahraga teratur dan pola makan yang sehat juga dapat sangat mempengaruhinya, karena gaya hidup yang seimbang dapat membantu mengatur metabolisme dan membakar lemak lebih efisien.

items.definition: Elastic bands used for strength training exercises

examples.text: Usage of Resistance bands is important.
Because Resistance bands matters, we should study it.
The word is Resistance bands, and it is useful.
If we use Resistance bands correctly, we succeed, so let's try.

items.definition: The act of doing or saying something again, especially in order to emphasize it or make it more effective

examples.text: The teacher asked the student to repeat the exercise.
examples.translation: Guru meminta siswa untuk mengulangi latihan.

examples.text: Because the lesson was not clear, the teacher had to repeat the explanation.
examples.translation: Karena pelajaran itu tidak jelas, guru harus mengulangi penjelasannya.

examples.text: The company will repeat the advertisement, and they will also offer a discount.
examples.translation: Perusahaan akan mengulangi iklan, dan mereka juga akan menawarkan diskon.

examples.text: While the teacher was explaining the lesson, she had to repeat some points because the students were not paying attention, but they eventually understood the concept.
examples.translation: Saat guru menjelaskan pelajaran, ia harus mengulangi beberapa poin karena siswa tidak memperhatikan, tetapi mereka akhirnya memahami konsepnya.

items.definition: A group of repetitions performed without rest

examples.text: Usage of Set is important.
Because Set matters, we should study it.
The word is Set, and it is useful.
If we use Set correctly, we succeed, so let's try.

items.definition: an activity that you do to prepare yourself for a physical or mental task

examples.text: The team did a warm-up before the match.
examples.translation: Tim melakukan pemanasan sebelum pertandingan.

examples.text: Because the concert was about to start, the orchestra did a quick warm-up to get ready.
examples.translation: Karena konser akan segera dimulai, orkestra melakukan pemanasan singkat untuk bersiap.

examples.text: The coach told the players to do a warm-up and then start practicing their shots.
examples.translation: Pelatih memerintahkan pemain untuk melakukan pemanasan dan kemudian memulai berlatih tembakan mereka.

examples.text: While the other team was doing their warm-up, our team was already preparing their strategy, and because they were well-prepared, they played exceptionally well.
examples.translation: Sementara tim lain melakukan pemanasan, tim kami sudah mempersiapkan strategi mereka, dan karena mereka sudah siap, mereka bermain dengan sangat baik.

items.definition: A set of low-intensity exercises performed after a workout

examples.text: Usage of Cool-down is important.
Because Cool-down matters, we should study it.
The word is Cool-down, and it is useful.
If we use Cool-down correctly, we succeed, so let's try.

items.definition: the practice of using jumps and other explosive movements to improve athletic performance
items.meaning: pelatihan menggunakan lompatan dan gerakan eksplosif lainnya untuk meningkatkan kinerja atletik

examples.text: Plyometrics is a great way to improve your jumping ability.
examples.translation: Plyometrik adalah cara yang baik untuk meningkatkan kemampuan melompat Anda.

examples.text: Because plyometrics is a high-intensity workout, it is essential to warm up before starting.
examples.translation: Karena plyometrik adalah latihan intensitas tinggi, sangat penting untuk melakukan pemanasan sebelum memulai.

examples.text: Plyometrics helps athletes jump higher, and it also improves their speed and agility.
examples.translation: Plyometrik membantu atlet melompat lebih tinggi, dan juga meningkatkan kecepatan dan kelincahan mereka.

examples.text: While plyometrics can be an effective way to improve athletic performance, it is crucial to note that it requires proper training and supervision, because if not done correctly, it can lead to injuries, and also, it is essential to warm up before starting.
examples.translation: Sementara plyometrik dapat menjadi cara yang efektif untuk meningkatkan kinerja atletik, sangat penting untuk dicatat bahwa itu memerlukan pelatihan dan pengawasan yang tepat, karena jika tidak dilakukan dengan benar, dapat menyebabkan cedera, dan juga, sangat penting untuk melakukan pemanasan sebelum memulai.

items.definition: The ability to move quickly and easily

examples.text: Usage of Agility is important.
Because Agility matters, we should study it.
The word is Agility, and it is useful.
If we use Agility correctly, we succeed, so let's try.

items.definition: The strength that you have in the central part of your body, which helps you to keep your balance and gives you power when you move

examples.text: Having core strength is essential for good posture.
examples.translation: Mempunyai kekuatan inti sangat penting untuk postur tubuh yang baik.

examples.text: Because she regularly practices yoga, she has developed the core strength that enables her to perform complex poses.
examples.translation: Karena dia secara teratur berlatih yoga, dia telah mengembangkan kekuatan inti yang memungkinkannya untuk melakukan pose yang kompleks.

examples.text: Core strength is important, and regular exercise helps to improve it, so I try to work out every day.
examples.translation: Kekuatan inti sangat penting, dan olahraga teratur membantu meningkatkannya, jadi saya mencoba berolahraga setiap hari.

examples.text: While having strong arms and legs is important, core strength is also crucial because it helps to stabilize the body, and regular exercise can improve it, which is why I try to work out every day.
examples.translation: Sementara memiliki lengan dan kaki yang kuat sangat penting, kekuatan inti juga sangat penting karena membantu menstabilkan tubuh, dan olahraga teratur dapat meningkatkannya, yang merupakan alasan mengapa saya mencoba berolahraga setiap hari.

items.definition: The way in which a person holds their body

examples.text: Usage of Posture is important.
Because Posture matters, we should study it.
The word is Posture, and it is useful.
If we use Posture correctly, we succeed, so let's try.

items.definition: The period needed for muscles to heal after exercise
A substance that builds up in muscles during intense exercise

examples.text: Usage of Lactic acid is important.
Because Lactic acid matters, we should study it.
The word is Lactic acid, and it is useful.
If we use Lactic acid correctly, we succeed, so let's try.

items.definition: The process of giving someone or something enough water or other liquid to keep them or it healthy and working properly

examples.text: Drinking water is essential for hydration.
examples.translation: Minum air sangat penting untuk pemberian cairan.

examples.text: Because she didn't drink enough water, her body lacked proper hydration, which made her feel weak.
examples.translation: Karena dia tidak minum air yang cukup, tubuhnya kekurangan cairan, sehingga membuatnya merasa lemah.

examples.text: I drink water to stay hydrated, and I also eat fruits to get more fluids.
examples.translation: Saya minum air untuk tetap terhidrasi, dan saya juga makan buah untuk mendapatkan lebih banyak cairan.

examples.text: While it's true that drinking water is essential for hydration, it's also important to note that eating foods with high water content can help, but only if you don't have certain medical conditions that require special hydration needs.
examples.translation: Sementara itu benar bahwa minum air sangat penting untuk pemberian cairan, juga penting untuk dicatat bahwa makan makanan dengan kandungan air tinggi dapat membantu, tetapi hanya jika Anda tidak memiliki kondisi medis tertentu yang memerlukan kebutuhan hidrasi khusus.

items.definition: Excessive exercise that leads to fatigue and decreased performance

examples.text: Usage of Overtraining is important.
Because Overtraining matters, we should study it.
The word is Overtraining, and it is useful.
If we use Overtraining correctly, we succeed, so let's try.

items.definition: a method of training in which you do short periods of energetic exercise followed by short periods of rest

examples.text: She does interval training to improve her endurance.
examples.translation: Dia melakukan latihan interval untuk meningkatkan ketahanannya.

examples.text: Because interval training is effective, many athletes use it to improve their performance.
examples.translation: Karena latihan interval efektif, banyak atlet menggunakan metode ini untuk meningkatkan kinerja mereka.

examples.text: Interval training is good for the heart, and it also improves muscle strength.
examples.translation: Latihan interval baik untuk jantung, dan juga meningkatkan kekuatan otot.

examples.text: While interval training can be challenging, many athletes use it because it is effective, and it also improves cardiovascular health.
examples.translation: Meskipun latihan interval bisa menantang, banyak atlet menggunakan metode ini karena efektif, dan juga meningkatkan kesehatan kardiovaskuler.

items.definition: The ability to focus on muscle engagement during exercise

examples.text: Usage of Mind-muscle connection is important.
Because Mind-muscle connection matters, we should study it.
The word is Mind-muscle connection, and it is useful.
If we use Mind-muscle connection correctly, we succeed, so let's try.
